value.title: DAX FRIDAYS! #178 : My age calculations in DAX and Power Query are wrong!! How do I do it?
value.excerpt: Calculating age is harder that you think, both in power query and dax.  In today's video, I am going to show you two ways to do it with DAX  and power query that get the closest to the actual age.  Do you know any other method to calculate age? Share it in the comments!  Link to previous power query

value.excerpt: Feeling confused on how M intellisense work and how it can help you write M code faster? value.title: Equivalent of CALENDARAUTO in Power Query (M)
value.excerpt: Do you want a calendar in Power Query that generates based on the sales or facts table? In other words, do you need a calendar that generates itself like the CALENDARAUTO does but in Power Query? Watch this tutorial to learn how to do this.
